name: carkorner.com
tagline: One stop shop for your every car needs.
body:
[CarKorner.com](http://www.carkorner.com) is the upcoming initiative to create an online presence for a community of dealers backed by experts in the automotive market for more than 20 years. ¬¬Our vision is to become a leading brand in the automotive market which can provide an online access to the sale and purchase of used cars from the dealers in the local market providing you assurance and trust. It also helps the users to make an informed decision while dealing in cars using various car specifications, car comparisons, expert reviews, and all the latest news updates in the car market.

Please email us at **contact@carkorner.com** for any queries and suggestions.


**Languages**: English

**Address:**
Balaji Cars,SB Arya School,
Karol Bagh West Extension Area,
Karol Bagh,
New Delhi,
India – 110005
